name: Prototyping With Heroku
tagline: A talk for NorDevCon by Pete Roome (@zoltarSpeaks)
body:
### Prototyping With Heroku
These are the slides that accompanied the talk i gave at NorDevCon on 28/02/14. The slides don't make much sense on their own with the context of the talk too. If and when there is a video link, i will accompany this repository with the necessary URL.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
